Even if slow, galloping without rest, even if lagging behind, even if failing, but must be able to reach the goal he aims for.

Home
Github

Features

Built-in rich features to meet general website requirements.

  • Article Information

    Add labels, categories, word count statistics, reading time, writing date and other information to articles.

  • Comments

    Support for 4 types of comment systems, you can freely choose the comment system that meets your needs.

  • Search

    Supports local search based on minisearch, supports Algolia search.

  • Encryption

    Supports full site encryption, partial encryption (encrypted directories, encrypted articles).

  • Code Copy

    One-click copy content in code blocks.

Blog

Theme Default support for blogging, generate your personal blog.

  • Article List

    Automatically sort and generate a blog article list page by the writing date of articles.

  • Blogger Information

    Customize name, motto, avatar, social media links.

  • Tags, Archive

    Automatically generate tag pages, archive articles by year.

pengzhanbo

💻

Responsive layout

Compatible with mobile devices, PCs, and tablets.

📖

Blog & Documentation

Whether you want to write a blog, create product documentation, or do both.

🚀

Out of the box

Support with zero configuration, also supports rich custom configurations.

⚖

Multilingual

Built-in support for Chinese/English, and the ability to add custom language support.

👨‍💻

Dual-color theme

Supports light/dark themes, including code highlighting.

📦

Plugins

Built-in with a rich variety of plugins, meeting the general needs of websites in one stop.

🔍

Search, review

Supports multiple comment systems, supports local search, Algolia search.

🔒

Encryption

Supports full-site encryption, partial encryption (encrypted directories, encrypted articles).

📝

Markdown Enhanced

Supports Markdown syntax, including code block grouping, hint containers, task lists, mathematical formulas, and code demos.
